descriptor: the guys are playing cards
C walks into M's + announces to them that he broke up w a girl for still superficial reasons
theme song
the guys are trying to figure out the reasoning of C
the weird neighbor tells M w Ra that they still have to bother his bird...
the weird neighbor goes home
he knocks on the ceiling + the guys answer him by knocking harder
Mr Heckles is dead (the weird neighbor)

the concierge introduces Mr. Heckles' notary because he bequeaths them his inheritance
the concierge leaves the apartment

transition
